transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Namaste ji bol rahi hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Haan ji mam main se bol rahi hu.
Executive: Ji mam bataiye.
Customer: Mam mujhe India Mart pe mera profile hai aap mere account manager hai shayad.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji.
Customer: Mam mere ko lead itna late kyu aa rahe hai. Recent meri itni recent lead meri 21 hours delay ki lead dikha raha hai. Lead to aate hi nahi hai mere ko pichle ek hafte se dhang se aa nahi rahi hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Mujhe ek minute dijiye na main check kar rahi hu.
Executive: Okay mam.
Executive: Ah mam main dekh pa rahi hu aapko abhi bike tyre se related ek ghante pehle ki fresh buylead aapke portal pe hai aap Uttar Pradesh ki 120.
Customer: Haan bas yahi ek yahi ek lead hai jo ek ghanta pehle.
Executive: Okay, baki aur koi lead nahi hai.
Customer: Haan bolo.
Executive: Ah mam aap remolded radial tyre mein deal karte hai?
Customer: Nahi.
Executive: Okay. Aur MRF commercial vehicle tyre?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan to mam main dekh pa rahi hu aapke regarding isme kafi abhi fresh leads bhi available hai.
Customer: Mere ko to nahi dikh rahi hai mere ko to sirf ek hi lead dikh rahi hai ek ghanta pehle wo Saharanpur wali kya wo thi bas wahi ek lead dikh rahi hai aur koi nahi dikh rahi hai mujhe.
Executive: Ah mam aap abhi video meet pe aa payenge do minute ke liye main aapko check kar dikha deti hu aur phir main ek bar aapko.
Customer: Mere paas phone hai abhi. Phone hai abhi phone pe kaise aayenge.
Executive: To mam kab aapke paas system available hoga kuch idea hai?
Customer: System main aapko 4 baje ke baad mil sakti hu system pe.
Executive: Aapke phone mein IndiaMART app nahi hai mam?
Customer: Nahi app to main phone se hi chalati hu lekin abhi whatsapp call pe screen share karke aa sakte hai ya to yaha pe shor bhi bahut hai to main dhang se baat bhi nahi kar paungi. Yaha pe main hu abhi.
Executive: To aapko sahi jo hai na 4 baje ek bar call karti hu video meet pe aapko bula ke aapko ye dikhwati hu aur dekhti bhi hu ki aapko wo dikh rahi hai ya nahi dikh rahi.
Customer: Thik hai mam.
Executive: Kyunki main main dekh pa rahi hu mam do minute pehle JK ki Bolero tyre type 21 minute pehle MRF commercial type ek ghante pehle truck tyre ek minute hold karunga.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Main bhi check kar rahi hu. Main hold karo aapko. Haan ji haan ji haan ji call pe rahiye.
Customer: Haan main call pe reh ke check karti hu.
Customer: Mam main agar relevant mein ja rahi hu to 21 hour pehle dikha raha hai.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Aur ye sab mujhe wahi dikha raha hai mam Hapur Uttar Pradesh ki. Haan ji ek ghanta pehle hai baki usse pehle 21 hours ki Bihar Uttar Pradesh se hai.
Customer: Aur baki JK tyre ki Ambala yesterday hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Nahi dikha pa raha mujhe.
Executive: Ek kam kariye upar jo filters available hote hai na un filters mein India wala filter please select kariye.
Customer: Kaunsa wala filter?
Executive: India location wale mein jo India wala hai. All dala hua hai madam maine.
Executive: All mat kariye mam usme India kariye specially.
Customer: Ab to dikha raha hai 4 minute pehle Lucknow ki 4 minute pehle Agra Uttar Pradesh ki. All karne pe to dikha raha hai par wo India karne pe dikha raha hai par lekin.
Executive: Haan bataiye.
Customer: Fir wo all pe chala gaya apne aap automatically all pe kyu ja raha hai ye?
Executive: Mam wo automatically apne aap jo hai chala jata hai usko aapko bar bar karna padega magar agar apne desktop pe agar aap kabhi check karenge jab aap use karenge filters apply karenge tab aapko bar bar ye filter select nahi karna hota hai.
Customer: Lekin mujhe main desk main to jyadatar to mujhe phone se istemal karti hu na.
Executive: To aap jo hai usme hamesha India wala filter hi usme select kara kariye mam jisse ki aapko properly phir aapko dikhe.
Customer: Agar main desktop pe ek bar nahi nahi ek bar main desktop pe select kar dungi usko to bar bar mujhe phone pe tab bhi select karna. Mam wo phone aur desktop wala aapas mein connected nahi hota hai agar aap man ke ek din pe yaha pe rahega jab aap desktop pe use karenge apni services tab jo hai jab aap desktop pe apni services use karengi aur us samay agar aap India wala filter select karengi tab aapko phir bar bar usko reset nahi karna padega but phone mein aapko reset karna pad jayega mam.
Customer: Phone mein check kar reset karna hi padega.
Executive: Haan ji mam wo aapko karna padega.
Customer: Chaliye thik hai mam main dekhti hu agar mujhe agar aisa karke main dekhti hu agar mujhe kal tak kuch thik lagta hai to phir karna main wapas call karti hu.
Executive: Haan mam I think abhi aapne na hamare helpline number pe call kiya tha.
Customer: Nahi abhi nahi kiya maine. Nahi maine call apne waha ja ke usse puch ke call kiya. Call.
Executive: Okay thik hai thik hai thik hai. Okay to mam aapka jo concern tha ye abhi ke liye resolve ho gaya hai na?
Customer: Haan ji bilkul ho gaya hai.
Executive: Okay agar aapko phir se ye concern raise hota hai mam please reach out to me I will help you. Okay mam okay.
Customer: Kyunki directly mujhe call aapko call aapko hi laga hai. Ha ha aapko chahiye to main aapko whatsapp pe hello bhi bhej dungi jisse ki aapka mera personal number aapke paas whatsapp karke available ho jayega to aap waha se bhi mujhe reach out kar payenge.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai mam thik hai. Okay mam thank you mam have a nice day.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not receiving buyleads properly.

Resolution:

- Executive checked and found fresh buyleads available.

- Executive guided to select India filter.

- Explained difference between desktop and phone settings.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will check and call back if needed.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, filters, desktop, mobile app
